thread.title: Calvin Pace: Jets’ Decision to Bring Toilet Paper to London Makes Them “Best Organization"
thread.title_full: Calvin Pace: Jets’ Decision to Bring Toilet Paper to London Makes Them “Best Organization" | Complex UK

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: Calvin Pace: Jets’ Decision to Bring Toilet Paper to London Makes Them “Best Organization"
text:
Much has been made over the last 24 hours about the Jets ’ decision to bring 350 rolls of toilet paper to London this week as they prepare to play a game on Sunday against the Dolphins . Apparently, people in London only use one-ply TP, so the Jets decided to bless their players and staff with two-ply TP this week by bringing it themselves. And earlier today after practice, linebacker Calvin Pace went as far as to say that the Jets are “the best organization in football” because of it.
“We’re the best organization in football, man,” he told the New York Daily News . “Sometimes, you guys write articles about us that don’t say that. But this place, they’ll do something for you. I mean, who brings toilet paper? Little things like that make your trip easier. If it’s a good thing for us, if it helps us win, I’m all for it.”
Pace admitted that he hasn’t actually used the two-ply TP yet—TMI?—but he was looking forward to enjoying one of the many comforts of home when he got back to the team hotel.
“At least I know I’ll have some familiar toilet paper,” he said.
It is the little things, right? The Jets may have gotten a lot of things wrong over the last few decades, but they apparently got this right.
 New York Daily News ]
